relatedanime.anime: Musekinin Kanchou Tylor: Chijou yori Eien ni
Musekinin Kanchou Tylor: Tokubetsu Hen - Hitoribocchi no Sensou

anime.description: Many years ago, http://anidb.net/ch7032 [Azalyn]`s best friend in all the universe was a similar aged boy named Ruu. Also royalty of a sort, they shared the way that children do and both pledged that one day they would rule fairly. Both also agreed that one day they would meet again. Also included on this disc are stories featuring http://anidb.net/ch7036 [Yamamoto]: the action hero, http://anidb.net/ch7042 [Kojirou] - testing a prototype fighter, http://anidb.net/ch7043 [Andresen] - evaluating the newest Marine Battlesuit, and "White Christmas", where it`s Christmas, http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Yuriko] is waiting and http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] is late.

externalentity.identifier: 無責任艦長タイラー_(アニメ)#OVA.E3.82.B7.E3.83.AA.E3.83.BC.E3.82.BA

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: novel
tag.description: A novel is a relatively long work of narrative fiction, normally written in prose form, and which is typically published as a book. Manga, comics, or visual novels do not fit this description and are not considered novels; including a small number of illustrations, however, is still permissible, which means that light novels are considered novels.

character.name: Azalyn D`el Kran Rykun
character.description: The 16-year-old empress of the Holy Raalgon Empire. Azalyn is a child, forced into the unenviable situation of having to assume power of the empire once her parents are murdered. Prompted by her advisors, she gives the command to attack the UPSF (assuming that they were behind the assassination plot). Having not had a chance to be a child, Azalyn must now be strong for the entire empire, and it`s a task that she is afraid of taking, but even more afraid of failing.

character.name: Yuriko Star
character.description: Lt. Commander Yuriko Star is another by-the-book officer. Yuriko joined the UPSF to give her life structure and attepts to obey the rules in almost every situation. However, she, unlike http://anidb.net/ch7036 [Yamamoto], has no problem telling http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] that he has done something wrong and will even resort to slapping him when he gets too far out of line. Yuriko also tries to downplay her gender, making herself a soldier first, and then a woman. This is a sore subject for her when someone comments about Tylor`s obvious attraction to her looks, pointing out that she has never used her appearance to get ahead; an equally sore point for her is her budding attraction to him. Yuriko is one of the most rational and level-headed officers on the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]. While she is senior to Yamamoto, her speciality as an intelligence officer places her outside the chain of command.

character.name: Justy Ueki Tylor
character.description: Justy Ueki Tylor joins the United Planets Space Force hoping for an easy ride through life but with the devil`s luck becomes a hero. He is soon promoted Lieutenant Commander and Captain of http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]. Tylor is a irresponsible laid back captain that can always find his way out of trouble unscathed. Tylor normally allows his crew to "bend" the rules such as letting the surgeon drink while on duty. Throughout the ranks it is argued that Tylor is either the most brilliant military mind or just a lucky bafoon.

character.name: Kyon-Hwa Kim
character.description: Kim works on the bridge as the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]`s communications officer. It is rumored that Kim was a fashion model prior to joining the military. She still enjoys dressing up and her urges to break out of the strict UPSF dress code cause problems between her and http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Yuriko Star]. Her hobbies include shopping and modern dance. She likes to read a women`s magazine called "Enen" in her free time, but is absolutely professional where her job is concerned. She is cool-headed in a crisis and extremely skilled as a communications officer. She says at one point that she transfered onto the Soyokaze in order to find direction in her life, and there`s the strong possibility she did it after breaking up with a man.

character.name: Makoto Yamamoto
character.description: Lieutenant Makoto Yamamoto is another very strait-laced, by-the-books military man. Yamamoto is the first officer on the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze] and tried mightily to interject an air of professionalism to the outfit. Constantly enraged by http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor]`s lack of discipline and his loose command of the troops, Yamamoto spends much of his free time in the medic`s office taking tranquilizers and making use of the neuro-cleanser. Yamamoto sees Tylor for what he is, a bumbling fool, but is torn between the unwritten soldier`s code of supporting and obeying your superior officer, and telling the UPSF brass what is REALLY going on. He is always on the lookout for a chance to get some form of command, hoping to get a ship of his own one day.

character.name: Hidezaburo Kitaguchi
character.description: Dr. Kitaguchi maintains the understaffed and under-stocked sick bay of the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]. A great lover of alcohol in all its form, he even uses it to anesthetize and sterilize his patients. While only 33 years old, Kitaguchi claims to have a 30-year drinking habit and proclaims that he performs better in surgery when he`s liquored up. With the arrival of http://anidb.net/ch7039 [Harumi], he becomes the envy of the entire male crew. He and http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] are drinking buddies, and he is one of the few crew members to gain a deep understanding of Tylor`s true nature early on. He claims the reason he became a doctor was because "it`s better than being a patient."

character.name: Harold Katori
character.description: Katori is the spiritual pilot/navigator the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]. A great lover of Japanese green tea - if he has a cup, he can be counted on to perform the most difficult maneuvers (like steering through an asteroid belt) without breaking a sweat. While he appears to be a Westerner, he is actually of Japanese descent. Possessed of a self-confidence that borders on arrogance, he claims that the ship is as "safe as a cradle" when he`s at the helm. His hobbies include various types of meditation, including Zen meditation.

character.name: Harumi Nakagawa
character.description: Assigned to the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze] as the http://anidb.net/ch7037 [Doctor]`s assistant, Harumi has every man on the ship falling all over her - especially the Marines. But she`s only after one man: http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor]! Unknow to most of the crew, Harumi is actually an android Raalgon spy. She was sent to the UPSF by http://anidb.net/ch7044 [Ru Baraba Dom] and http://anidb.net/ch38778 [Shia Has] to kill Tylor. Instead, she succumbs to Tylor`s charm and ends up falling in love with him!

character.name: Yumi Hanner
character.description: The remarkable http://anidb.net/ch7041 [Emi] and Yumi Hanner are young girls who first meet http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Tylor] while they are taking care of their father, Admiral http://anidb.net/ch38780 [Robert J. Hanner] (retired). After they are taken hostage, Emi and Yumi are rescued by Tylor and fall in love with him. They join the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]`s crew when Tylor is reassigned as its captain. Desired to pilot ships, they persuade http://anidb.net/ch7042 [Kojirou] to train them (against his will of course) and discover that they have a natural piloting ability. Emi and Yumi`s close quarters with Kojirou provide them with endless amusement since he is deathly afraid of females. Identical twins, the only way to tell them apart is by their pony tails (Yumi`s is on the left side of her head, while Emi`s is on her right) and their voices (Yumi`s is higher pitched than Emi`s). They were also childhood friends of http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Yuriko Star].

character.name: Emi Hanner
character.description: The remarkable Emi and http://anidb.net/ch7040 [Yumi] Hanner are young girls who first meet http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Tylor] while they are taking care of their father, Admiral http://anidb.net/ch38780 [Robert J. Hanner] (retired). After they are taken hostage, Emi and Yumi are rescued by Tylor and fall in love with him. They join the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]`s crew when Tylor is reassigned as its captain. Desired to pilot ships, they persuade http://anidb.net/ch7042 [Kojirou] to train them (against his will of course) and discover that they have a natural piloting ability. Emi and Yumi`s close quarters with Kojirou provide them with endless amusement since he is deathly afraid of females. Identical twins, the only way to tell them apart is by their pony tails (Yumi`s is on the left side of her head, while Emi`s is on her right) and their voices (Yumi`s is higher pitched than Emi`s). They were also childhood friends of http://anidb.net/ch7033 [Yuriko Star].

character.name: Kojirou Sakai
character.description: The supremely self-confident pilot of the Ranpu-class fighter assigned to the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze]. Known alternately as "The Samurai of Space" and "The Shoot-Down King," Kojirou graduated with honors from flight training. While he hasn`t logged that many hours of flight time, he shows deadly skill against the Raalgon forces. Possessing an actual phobia of women, he seems to regard the Hanner sisters as a special case, no doubt owing to their own natural piloting skill. He keeps a small mascot doll the twins made for him in the cockpit of his fighter. He also gets along very poorly with the Marines.

character.name: Karl Bjorn Andresen
character.description: Andressen is the pilot of the Dropship, the troop transport which carries the Marines into combat. Nicknamed "Eric the Red," he seems to be the most mature person aboard the http://anidb.net/ch7063 [Soyokaze].

character.name: Ru Baraba Dom
character.description: Ru Baraba Dom is the commander of the Raalgon cruiser Doroume, 66th Detached Fleet. As the war progresses, http://anidb.net/ch7032 [Azalyn] comes to trust his intelligent advice. Unlike many of his fellow colleagues, Dom respects and admires http://anidb.net/ch7034 [Tylor] for his fighting and tactical abilities. Both Tylor and Dom recognize that wars can only be won when no one fights. He is loyal to the young empress and stands firmly in Lonawer`s camp to find a way to end the war honorably and with a minimum of bloodshed.

character.name: Naku Ra Wang
character.description: Chief Advisor to the Holy Raalgon Empress, Wang craves to be more than just the Premier. He places the blame of the Emperor`s death on the UPSF and craftily convinces Empress http://anidb.net/ch7032 [Azalyn] to declare war with them. Meanwhile, Wang continues to manipulate the Empire`s opinion against the Empress to force her to bend to his will. Hungry for the power of the throne, he makes several attempts on Azalyn`s life.

character.name: Mickey Cryburn
character.description: Cryburn is the commander of the Marine contingent on board. His Hammer combat suit is painted pink and he seems to be best friends with http://anidb.net/ch7043 [Andressen].

character.name: Soyokaze
character.description: While its design is old, this destroyer is a hardy veteran of many battles. It`s equipped with long-range laser cannons and photon torpedos as well as phaser banks for point defense.
